example.parse: (S (NP-TPC-1 (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC بيان) (NP (DET+NOUN_PROP الحريري))) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS تميز) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN تفاصيل)) (ADJP (ADJ_COMP+CASE_INDEF_GEN اكثر) (PP (PREP من) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN بيان) (NP (NOUN_PROP بعبدا))))))))))

arg.g: by more details than the statement of Baabda

role.argrole: from what or from whom (comes after عن)
